other_tests.findings: Xanthomas began to improve after therapy; pain in wrist, elbow, and knee joints gradually resolved along with redness.
other_tests.changes_over_time: When the patient was 36 years of age, maximum thickness was 0.6 mm on the right and 0.9 mm on the left, indicating a decrease in thickness.

other_tests.findings: Maximum intima-media thickness was 1.3 mm on the right and 1.2 mm on the left.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At age 36, findings were normal with maximum thickness 0.6 mm on the right and 0.9 mm on the left, thickness decreased over time.
